abstract thx.Validation<E, A>(Either<E, A>) from Either<E, A>

Available on all platforms

A right-biased disjunctive type with applicative functor requiring a semigroup on the left type. This is useful for composing validation functions.

Class Fields

function pure<E, A>(a:A):Validation<E, A>

inline function val2<X, A, B, C>(f:A -> B -> C, v1:Validation<X, A>, v2:Validation<X, B>, appendErrors:X -> X -> X):Validation<X, C>

inline function val3<X, A, B, C, D>(f:A -> B -> C -> D, v1:Validation<X, A>, v2:Validation<X, B>, v3:Validation<X, C>, appendErrors:X -> X -> X):Validation<X, D>

inline function val4<X, A, B, C, D, E>(f:A -> B -> C -> D -> E, v1:Validation<X, A>, v2:Validation<X, B>, v3:Validation<X, C>, v4:Validation<X, D>, appendErrors:X -> X -> X):Validation<X, E>

function ap<B>(v:Validation<E, A -> B>, appendErrors:E -> E -> E):Validation<E, B>
